element.name: RGBtoColor
element.short: Convert R, G, B to a Win32 Colour.

element.name: ColorToRGB
element.short: Convert a Win32 colour to RGB.

element.name: RGBToXYZ
element.short: Convert R, G, B to X, Y, Z.

element.name: XYZToRGB
element.short: Convert X, Y, Z to R, G, B.

element.name: RGBToHSL
element.short: Convert R, G, B to H, S, L.
element.descr: This function multiplies the H, S, L values returned by 100.

element.name: HSLtoRGB
element.short: Convert H, S, L to R, G, B.

element.name: RGBToHSLNonFixed
element.short: Convert R, G, B to H, S, L.
element.descr: This function does not multiply the returned H, S, L by 100.

element.name: ColorToHSL
element.short: Convert win32 colour to H, S, L.

element.name: ColorToXYZ
element.short: Convert Win32 colour to X, Y, Z.

element.name: HSLToColor
element.short: Convert H, S, L to win32 colour.

element.name: XYZToColor
element.short: Convert X, Y, Z to win32 colour.

element.name: BGRToRGB
element.short: Swizzle B, G, R to R, G, B.
